> Surely "primary sources" presupposes Japanese?! 

Have you looked at "Samurai, Warfare and the State in Early Medieval 
Japan" by Karl Friday. (Routledge 2004). He considers several of these 
issues. The book has an extensive bibliography of primary and 
secondary sources. As to where you find these...I guess you just have 
to use university libraries, andsearch on Google.

Good luck!

Gillian
